name: AudioPlayer
0:
”Alexa, ask Audio Player channel "BBC".”
”Alexa, ask Audio Player radio "Javan".”
”Alexa, ask Audio Player channel "one".”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: audio player
des:
This is an application which streams audio from live Persian TV channels and radio to play on Alexa.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4mFALYeqejo
Notice of content: Some live streams are in Farsi.

Below are list of commands:

1- Alexa, ask Audio Player channel "BBC". (Alexa, ask Audio Player to play channel "BBC". Alexa, ask Audio Player channel "one".)
2- Alexa, ask Audio Player radio "Javan". (Alexa, ask Audio Player to play radio "Javan". Alexa, ask Audio Player radio "one".)
3- Alexa, ask Audio Player channel list: Read list of available channels.
4- Alexa, ask Audio Player radio list: Read list of available radio.
5- Alexa, ask Audio Player to help: Help you by reading available commands.
6- Alexa, open Audio Player: Wait for your command. (example: channel "one").
7-Alexa, stop: Pause audio stream.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
